# SportBot AI - Complete Documentation for LLMs

> AI-Powered Sports Analytics Platform - "Find where the market is wrong"

## Executive Summary

SportBot AI is an educational sports analytics platform built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and modern AI technologies. We provide AI-driven match analysis with probability estimates, value detection, and risk assessment across multiple sports.

**Mission**: Help users understand sports matches through data-driven insights. We sell understanding, not winning.

**Important Disclaimer**: This is an educational/analytical tool, NOT a tipster service or gambling advice platform.

---

## Platform Overview

### What We Do

SportBot AI analyzes sports matches using artificial intelligence to deliver:

1. **Match Probability Estimates**: Data-driven probability calculations for match outcomes
2. **Value Detection**: Identify when bookmaker odds may be mispriced
3. **Risk Assessment**: Understand the confidence level and variance of predictions
4. **Team Form Analysis**: Recent performance trends and momentum indicators
5. **Head-to-Head Statistics**: Historical matchup data and patterns
6. **Key Player Impact**: How individual players affect match outcomes
7. **Contextual Factors**: Weather, venue, travel, and scheduling considerations

### Technology Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 14 (App Router), React 18, TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom design system
- **AI/ML**: OpenAI GPT-4, Perplexity for real-time data
- **Database**: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- **Payments**: Stripe for subscriptions
- **Hosting**: Vercel

---

## Sports Coverage

### Major Sports

| Sport | Leagues Covered |
|-------|-----------------|
| ‚öΩ Soccer | Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, Champions League, Europa League, MLS, World Cup |
| üèÄ Basketball | NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA Basketball |
| üèà American Football | NFL, NCAA Football |
| üéæ Tennis | ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open) |
| üèí Ice Hockey | NHL |
| ‚öæ Baseball | MLB |
| üèâ Rugby | Six Nations, Rugby World Cup |
| üèè Cricket | IPL, International Matches |

### Data Sources

- Live odds from 15+ bookmakers
- Real-time injury and lineup updates
- Weather data for outdoor sports
- Historical performance databases

---

## Product Features

### Match Analyzer (Core Product)

The main analysis tool available at `/analyzer`:

**Inputs**:
- Select sport (dropdown)
- Select match (from live feed or manual entry)
- Choose analysis depth

**Outputs**:
- Win/Draw/Loss probabilities
- Confidence score (1-5 stars)
- Value rating for each outcome
- Risk level assessment
- Key factors affecting the match
- Recommended considerations

### AI Sports Desk (Premium)

Conversational AI assistant for sports analysis:
- Ask questions about any match
- Get real-time updates and news
- Compare teams and players
- Historical data queries

### Market Alerts (Premium)

Automated notifications for:
- Significant odds movements
- Value opportunities
- Breaking news affecting matches

### My Teams (All Users)

Personalized experience:
- Follow favorite teams
- Custom dashboard with upcoming matches
- Team-specific insights

---

## Subscription Tiers

### Free Tier
- **Price**: $0/month
- **Analyses**: 3 per day
- **Features**: Basic probability estimates, team form, H2H stats
- **Limitations**: No prediction history, basic insights only

### Pro Tier
- **Price**: $9.99/month (or $99.99/year - save 17%)
- **Analyses**: 15 per day
- **Features**: Advanced analytics, value detection, prediction history, enhanced insights
- **Best For**: Regular sports enthusiasts

### Premium Tier
- **Price**: $19.99/month (or $199.99/year - save 17%)
- **Analyses**: Unlimited
- **Features**: AI Sports Desk, market alerts, priority support, all Pro features
- **Best For**: Serious analysts and researchers

---

## Content & Blog

Our blog at `/blog` covers:

- Sports analytics methodology
- Match previews and analysis
- Betting education and responsible gambling
- AI in sports industry
- League and tournament guides
- Player and team spotlights

All content is AI-assisted but human-reviewed for accuracy.

---

## Legal & Compliance

### Age Restriction
This platform is strictly for users **18 years and older**.

### Responsible Gambling
We promote responsible gambling and provide resources for those who need help:
- National Council on Problem Gambling: 1-800-522-4700
- GamCare: www.gamcare.org.uk
- Gamblers Anonymous: www.gamblersanonymous.org

### No Guarantees
We explicitly do NOT guarantee:
- Winning outcomes
- Profitable results
- Accuracy of predictions

All analysis is for educational purposes only.

### Data Privacy
- We collect minimal personal data
- No selling of user data to third parties
- GDPR compliant
- Full details at /privacy

---

## Technical Documentation

### Site Structure

```
/                       - Home page with live matches
/analyzer               - Main analysis tool
/matches                - Browse all upcoming matches
/match/[id]             - Individual match detail
/blog                   - Analytics articles
/blog/[slug]            - Individual blog post
/pricing                - Subscription plans
/account                - User dashboard
/my-teams               - Personalized team tracking
/history                - Prediction history (Pro+)
/market-alerts          - Alert configuration (Premium)
/ai-desk                - AI chat assistant (Premium)
/terms                  - Terms of Service
/privacy                - Privacy Policy
/responsible-gambling   - Gambling resources
/contact                - Contact form
```

### API Endpoints (Internal Use)

```
POST /api/analyze       - Submit match for analysis
GET  /api/sports        - List available sports
GET  /api/events/[sport]- Get upcoming events
GET  /api/odds/[sport]  - Get current odds
POST /api/agent         - AI Sports Desk queries
```

Note: No public API is currently offered.

### Schema.org Markup

We implement structured data for:
- Organization
- WebSite with SearchAction
- Article for blog posts
- BreadcrumbList for navigation
- FAQPage where applicable

For technical issues or questions:
1. Check our FAQ at /pricing (bottom section)
2. Use the contact form at /contact
3. Email directly at contact@sportbotai.com

---

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is SportBot AI a tipster service?**
A: No. We provide analytical tools for understanding matches, not tips or picks.

**Q: How accurate are the predictions?**
A: We don't make predictions - we provide probability estimates based on available data. Sports have inherent unpredictability.

**Q: Can I use SportBot AI for gambling?**
A: Our tool is for educational purposes. If you choose to gamble, please do so responsibly and within your means.

**Q: What sports do you cover?**
A: Soccer, Basketball (NBA), American Football (NFL), Tennis, Ice Hockey (NHL), Baseball (MLB), Rugby, and Cricket.

**Q: Is there a mobile app?**
A: We offer a Progressive Web App (PWA) that can be installed on mobile devices from the browser.

**Q: How do I cancel my subscription?**
A: Go to /account and click "Manage Subscription" to cancel anytime.

---

## Version History

- **v2.0** (December 2025): AI Sports Desk, Market Alerts, enhanced analytics
- **v1.5** (October 2025): Multi-sport support, live odds integration
- **v1.0** (August 2025): Initial launch with soccer analysis
